#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<utility>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
typedef pair<ll,ll> pll;


int main()
{
	int t,x,y,z,p,num;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>num>>x>>y>>z;
		
		for(int i=9;i>0;i--)
		{
			for(int j=9;j>=0;j--)
			{
				p=x*1000+y*100+z*10;
				p+=i*10000+j;
				if(p%num==0)
				{
					cout<<i<<" "<<j<<" ";
					cout<<p/num<<endl;
					goto out;
				}
			}
		}
		cout<<"0\n";
		out:;
	}
	return 0;
}
